description: This file is a Markdown document used as a presentation slide deck for Slidev, a markdown-based presentation tool. It contains frontmatter YAML configuration, slide content with markdown syntax, embedded HTML, Vue components, Mermaid diagrams, LaTeX equations, and various other features supported by Slidev.

methods.name: sayHello
methods.description: External method imported from an external TypeScript snippet, likely a utility function used in the slide.
